short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly sign-in to apps stored in your Aglide

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aglide lets customers directly connect any application to their Identity Access Manager, regardless of whether it natively supports SAML, SCIM, or OIDC. This means apps that have an unviable SSO Tax or no SSO support at all can be requested, managed, and accessed directly from your existing SSO environment. 

The Aglide Extension also provides access to the Aglide Password Manager - letting you store items like API keys and expense cards. This version of the Aglide Extension supports Aglide RBAC - letting admins provision and deprovision accounts and manage their end-users' privileges.

This extension requires an Aglide account. Learn more about Aglide and sign your team up at https://aglide.com
